game.name: Focus Grove
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Surround Sound, Touch Only Option, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 당신만의 아늑한 숲속 농장을 만들고… 삶 속에서도 함께 성장하세요. Focus Grove는 집중력, 행복감, 그리고 일과 삶의 균형을 돕는 마음챙김 게임입니다. 당신의 숲에서 성장하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Build your cozy forest farm… while thriving in life. Focus Grove is a mindful game that improves your focus, well-being and work-life balance. Let your animals grow your farm, while you grow in life.
